name: SpaceGame
description: SpaceGame is my first C# project made in Unity. It is a simple space shooter game where you control a spaceship and shoot down enemy ships

name: Shelly 3 pro Electricity Switch
description: This is a project with my friend. We made script for Shelly 3 Pro electricity exchange switch. It switches relays on and off based on current electricity price using api.

name: Reppu
description: Reppu is a school group project. We made a device register system with database.
